articles.title: TV actress Leena Acharya dies of kidney failure - India Today
articles.description: TV actress Leena Acharya died of kidney failure on Saturday. She was suffering from kidney ailment for around two years and her mother had donated her the organ.
articles.content: Television actress Leena Acharya died of kidney failure in Delhi on Saturday. The actress was suffering from kidney ailments for around two years. Her mother had donated her a kidney but even the org… [+1206 chars]

articles.title: Prabhudeva`s wedding to Mumbai-based doctor confirmed - Details here - Zee News
articles.description: Ace choreographer-filmmaker-actor Prabhudeva got married to a Mumbai-based doctor in May, his brother confirmed recently. Speculations were rife about Prabhudeva s wedding and initially, it was reported that he is getting married to his niece.
